{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNDR3700 |revision=v1 |fcc_date=08/07/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY308300092 |ic_id=4054A-08300092 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7161 |cpu1_cspeed=680 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622FTP-D43 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9223 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366SR |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=DFS |tp_firmware=OpenWrt,DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:26:F2,30:46:9A,C0:3F:0E,E0:91:F5 |oui_eth=00:26:F2,30:46:9A,C0:3F:0E,E0:91:F5 }} ''N600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router''
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNDR3700v1|vs_id=11640}} Simultaneous Dual-Band
Gigabit Ethernet [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wndr3700 On the OpenWrt wiki]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Netgear_WNDR3700 On the DD-WRT wiki]
{{TechInfoDepot|Netgear_WNDR3700_1.0}} [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=30039 OUI mention] "2976326605" is silkscreened on the board per the images on TechInfoDepot. The default SSIDs may be '''NETGEAR''' (2.4GHz) and '''NETGEAR-5G''' (5GHz).
